Text: FW Re Enron Dynegy Integration Team MembersSteve I would appreciate you consider me having a role in the integration our two companies together I know I can make an immediate impact to the process and would also be recommended by many people here at Enron Thanks for your consideration Andy Unverzagt Original Message From Olson Cindy Sent Monday November PM To Unverzagt Andy Subject RE Re Enron Dynegy Integration Team Members Andy thanks for your emailI will absolutely make sure your name is considered Original Message From Unverzagt Andy Sent Monday November AM To Olson Cindy Cc Mcconnell Mike Fallon Jim Subject Re Enron Dynegy Integration Team Members To Cindy Olsen Copy Mike McConnell Jim Fallon Re Enron Dynegy Integration Team Members As I was reading Ken Lays announcements about Enrons merger with Dynegy he mentioned forming an integration team Having twentythree plus years of a wide range of knowledge and experience across much of Enron I feel and believe I could be a key contributor in the integration of our two companies together My career with Enron has ranged from activities with many parts of our trading business key roles in large and complex Merger and Acquisition projects as well as working on our various pipelines I would like to be considered to be part of the transition team Your support would be appreciated Andy Unverzagt Vice President Enron Broadband Services

Enron FieldHope all is well with you guys I am excited about our fatherdaughter outing to ENRON FIELD later this month I understand that there is a person at Enron who coordinates these events for us If you would not mind would you give me the persons name Eric is in the Boy Scouts and this sounds like an outing that would be interesting for them also Thanks Andy

Enron FieldHope all is well with you guys I am excited about our fatherdaughter outing to ENRON FIELD later this month I understand that there is a person at Enron who coordinates these events for us If you would not mind would you give me the persons name Eric is in the Boy Scouts and this sounds like an outing that would be interesting for them also Thanks Andy

OpportunitiesDan I have been making good progress on working through my EBS commitments and will in a week or less be in a good position to discuss opportunities with your organization Thanks for taking the time to meet with me Andy Unverzagt

Fw okiesall is well with everyone An old high school college buddy sent this to me It is better than most Andy Subject okies Date Saturday August PM The top ways you know youre from Oklahoma It doesnt bother you to use an airport named for a man who died in an airplane crash You have used the phrase fixin to during the last twelve months Someone you know has used a football schedule to plan their wedding date Youve ever been excused from school because the cows got out You can properly pronounce Eufaula Gotebo Okemah and Chickasha You can remember the name of the last state legislator to introduce a bill involving castration and he didnt mean farm animals You know exactly what calf fries are and eat them anyway You can recall hot summers by the year they happened easier than you can remember your mothers birthday You think that people who complain about the wind in their states are sissies You know that the true value of a parking space is not determined by the distance to the door but by the availability of shade You have owned at least one belt buckle bigger than your fist A bad traffic jam involves two cars staring each other down at a fourway stop each determined to be the most polite and let the other go first You know in which state Miamuh is and in which state Miamee is Your place at the lake has wheels under it You arent surprised to find movie rental ammunition and bait all in the same store A Mercedes Benz is not a status symbol A Ford F x is You understand the difference between and point and more than once youve made a beer run to another state You know that everything goes better with Ranch You learned how to shoot a gun before you learned how to multiply A tornado warning siren is your signal to go out in the yard and look for a funnel Finally you are Oklahoman if you have ever had this conversation You wanna Coke Yeah What kind Dr Pepper

Mark Mark Hope all is well with you guys in Denver I hope you are able to continue to make deals and are not caught up in the unbelievable craziness here in Houston I was looking for companies to approach about employment and Burlington Resources name came up I assume Lee Hanse is still with them I was going to send him an email with my resume Any thoughts about BR Thanks Andy

REMark Thanks for the insight Andy Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Monday November AM To Unverzagt Andy Subject RE All of our producers have cut us off and I hate to try and get them in a deal with us because I dont know if they will get paid I would talk to Lee at BR I know he is under water with the Canadian Hunter acquisition You would be a major star at Hanover any interest I think I would talk to Kinder Morgan They have a lot of projects on the books as well as Calpine They really need gas help Good Luck and stay in touch Original Message From Unverzagt Andy Sent Monday November AM To Whitt Mark Subject Mark Mark Hope all is well with you guys in Denver I hope you are able to continue to make deals and are not caught up in the unbelievable craziness here in Houston I was looking for companies to approach about employment and Burlington Resources name came up I assume Lee Hanse is still with them I was going to send him an email with my resume Any thoughts about BR Thanks Andy
